```{r setup}
library(SparseDFM)
head(inflation)
X = as.matrix(inflation)
```

```{r}
sol = SparseDFM(X, 3, q = 1,
          alphas = logspace(-2,3,100),
          alg = 'EM-sparse',
          err = 'AR1',
          kalman = 'univariate',
          standardize = TRUE,
          max_iter=100,
          threshold=1e-4)

```
